import React, {useState } from 'react' import "./App.css" function Form(){ const [inputData,setInputData]=useState({ name: '', email:'', password:'', mobile:'', gender:'', hobbies:[], }) function handleChanges(e){ setInputData({...inputData ,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) console.log(inputData) } const handleSubmit =(e) =>{ e.preventDefault() console.log(inputData) } //Reset fun create const ResetFun =()=>{ setInputData({name:'',email:'',}) } return(
